main event: Several UFO sightings were reported in Montana during March 1959, including a green blinking light and a cone-shaped object observed by pilots.
interesting points: The first witness saw a green blinking light moving slowly across the sky for about 15-20 minutes,The light appeared to be the size of a golf ball and blinked on and off at regular intervals,An F-89 crew described a cone-shaped object glowing reddish-orange traveling at estimated speeds of 500-600 mph,Various military personnel reported multiple sightings around the same time period,Some radar indications attempted to track these unidentified objects but failed to maintain contact.
sighted object: green blinking light and a cone-shaped object
